room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Lincoln Escape Room in Lincoln
review: We had a great time escaping The Cure! It was the first time in an escape room for all four of us. The game was challenging but not impossible! We escaped with a couple minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Lincoln Escape Room in Lincoln
review: We went as a family to “The Cure” and had a fabulous time. We solved with just 5 seconds to spare. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Lincoln Escape Room in Lincoln
review: This was so much fun! I went with 2 friends and we made it out of the science room with 5 minutes to spare. The staff was great about giving us hints when we weren't making much progress in the room. I would definitely recommend this to all my friends and family!
